text:
Central Michigan University| Mt. Pleasant MI | Full-time/Onsite | Software Engineering Team Lead | cmich.edu

Description:The Software Development Team Lead is a part of an agile development team responsible for building and maintaining enterprise-grade software systems, primarily using the Microsoft .NET development stack. We are looking for talented individuals who want to help students achieve success in the pursuit of their education through providing an excellent IT experience.

Benefits:

- 10% (without match) to Retirement (403B)

- Public Sector medical benefits (extremely low deductibles, comprehensive medical coverage including dental, vision, long term disability, etc)

- Free tuition for you or your family for a Bachelor, Masters or Doctoral degree(s).

- 14 Paid Holidays per year in addition to vacation time

Pay Range: $60,000-$80,000

Position will remain open until filled.

More details at: https://www.jobs.cmich.edu/postings/27980
